DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject least 18 year old provide inform consent ; 2 . Subject viable singleton twin pregnancy ; 3 . Subject confirm least 10 week , 0 day gestation time study blood draw ; 4 . Subject plan undergo CVS and/or amniocentesis purpose genetic analysis fetus OR subject already undergone CVS and/or amniocentesis know fetus chromosomal abnormality confirm genetic analysis . 1 . Subject know aneuploidy ; 2 . Subject pregnant two fetus sonographic evidence three gestational sac time pregnancy ; 3 . Subject fetal demise ( include natural elective reduction ) identify prior consent ; 4 . Subject history malignancy treat chemotherapy and/or major surgery , bone marrow transplant ;
